Cincinnati.First Universalist Church (Cincinnati, O:
First Universalist Church is a registered historic building in Cincinnati, Ohio, listed in the National Register on March 3, 1980.


== Historic uses ==
Religious Structure
This church incorporated as City Temple—First Universalist Church was the result of a merger between the "First Universalist Church of Cincinnati" and the "New Thought Temple". It was located on Essex Place in the Walnut Hills section of Cincinnati.
